caption: Observable Source
description: The observable source object provides a reference to the event/finding attribute where the observable was seen.
name: observable_source

event_uid.description:
The unique identifier of the source event/finding.

If the source event/finding is in OCSF, then this value must be equal to metadata.uid in the corresponding event, or left unspecified to indicate the source event/finding is the root object.

json_path.description: The JSON path of the attribute in the event/finding matching event_uid where the observable was seen. For example: evidences[2].device.network_interfaces[0].ip
